item.title: Atlantic Beat On Deep !!!
item.description: On this set Play's: Dead Can Dance - Nierika + Saint Etienne - The Way We Live Now - Finisterre + Asian Dub Foundation - Dhol Rinse - Enemy Of The Enemy + Brian Eno and David Byrne - Regiment - My Life in the Bush of Ghosts + Massive Attack - What Your Soul Sings - 100th Window + Boozoo Bajou - Night Over Mamaus - Coste La Suite + Lamb - Ear Parcel - Fear Of Fours + Great music show's on the site: www.internationalmusicpodcast.com
